name: Survive! (itch) (Loki)
description:
Hi all! I am glad to present you a prototype game called "Survive!" I created it alone in a couple of weeks. In the future, if people like the project, I will work it out more carefully and add a lot of new content to the game! The game is a limited zone where you have to hold out as long as possible and repel the attack of a crowd of zombies. Why does the game cost 1 dollar? I need to recoup the cost of developing this game.

Be sure to leave your review and your opinion regarding the game, and if you liked the game, follow the link to my patreon and vote for my next projects!

The choice is up to you!

Attention before buying, please read the following information: My patreon - Patreon

For personal questions and other my email - 13371337ddd@gmail.com

Minimal system requirements for stable operation at 75+ fps 

Game only for windows. 

GPU - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080

CPU: Intel Core i5-2400 

RAM: 8 GB RAM

DX: Version 11

OS: Windows 10 64-bit

STO: 1.5GB available space

Not tested on AMD systems!
